  en-US: Basic Usage
---

## zh-CN

最简单的用法。

## en-US

The simplest use

```jsx
import { Breadcrumb } from 'antd';

ReactDOM.render(
  <Breadcrumb>
    <Breadcrumb.Item>Home</Breadcrumb.Item>
    <Breadcrumb.Item>
      <a href="">Application Center</a>
    </Breadcrumb.Item>
    <Breadcrumb.Item>
      <a href="">Application List</a>
    </Breadcrumb.Item>
    <Breadcrumb.Item>An Application</Breadcrumb.Item>
  </Breadcrumb>,
  mountNode,
);
```
